pluginDesc.message: GasNow code with etherchain.org api to estimate eth gas prediction

defaultGasMsg.message: The values will be displayed over the icon of this extension. It's recommended to pin this extension.

noticeTitle2.message: (It only works when the value getting from default option is lower than the alarm value)

noticeMsg.message: Please allow the extension to push notifications. A notification will pop up every 10 minutes.
